hero_slide2_subtitle: Full management of visas and permits
section_description: Axenta Global Energy & Service S.L. is a company based in Andalusia, Spain, primarily specialized in workforce placement from both European Union countries and non-EU countries. Our commitment is to provide legal, transparent, and effective solutions to connect people with the companies that need talent.
card1_text: We select workers from the European Union and outside to meet the demand in Spain.
card2_text: All processes are managed legally, clearly, and transparently.
card3_text: We comply with labor legislation and ensure the rights of workers and companies.
card4_text: We collaborate with trusted companies and partners in Europe, Africa, and Asia.
valor2_text: Respect for both clients and workers.
valor4_text: We care about people, not just numbers.
servicio1_text: Looking for a fresh start in agriculture or construction? Join a team that values your skills and supports your journey.
servicio2_text: Ready to shape the future of commercial, industrial, office, and residential spaces? Join our team.
servicio3_text: Join a team that delivers efficient and safe transport with precision and pride. We‚Äôre committed to premium quality, reliable service.
servicio4_text: Join a team that delivers professional services to restaurants, hotels, and catering with precision and care. If you take pride in the details.
beneficio2: Experience in the international labor sector
beneficio3: Apoyo continuo a trabajadores y empresas

slogan: Being a bridge between people and opportunities, supporting companies in their growth and offering workers the chance of a better future in Spain.

gallery.title: Who we are
gallery.text: We are a company specialized in bringing workers to Spain from both the EU and non-EU countries, providing full assistance with visas, work permits, and support throughout the entire process.

gallery.title: Collaboration Steps
gallery.text:
1. Brief and requirements
2. Contract and schedule
3. Recruitment and documentation
4. Arrival and integration into the position

gallery.title: FAQ
gallery.text:
Q: How long does it take to receive personnel?
A: Depending on the profile and documentation, 3‚Äì8 weeks for non-EU; 1‚Äì3 weeks for EU.

Q: Do you also manage accommodation?
A: We can coordinate options and logistics according to the project.

Q: What guarantees do you offer?
A: Contractual transparency clauses, replacement during trial period according to agreement.

terms_workers_intro: These Terms and Conditions regulate the relationship between workers (hereinafter, ‚Äúthe Worker‚Äù) and Axenta Global Energy & Service S.L. (hereinafter, ‚Äúthe Company‚Äù).
terms_workers_1_text: This document establishes the conditions under which the Worker provides services through the Company.
terms_workers_2_list: Receive the agreed remuneration in due time and form.
Enjoy breaks, leave, and vacation in accordance with applicable law.
Be treated with equality and without discrimination.
terms_workers_3_list: Perform assigned tasks and responsibilities diligently.
Comply with the internal regulations of the Company.
Maintain confidentiality of any information accessed.
terms_workers_4_text: Remuneration will be as contractually agreed and will be paid in the agreed manner and terms. Applicable legal deductions will be made.
terms_workers_5_text: The results of the work performed by the Worker may be assigned to the Company, as stipulated in the individual contract.
terms_workers_6_text: The Company will process the Worker‚Äôs personal data in accordance with Spanish and European data protection regulations.
terms_workers_7_text: These terms are governed by Spanish law. For the resolution of disputes, the parties submit to the courts of Ja√©n.
terms_employers_intro: These Terms and Conditions regulate the relationship between the company (hereinafter, ‚Äúthe Company‚Äù) and Axenta Global Energy & Service S.L. (hereinafter, ‚Äúthe Provider‚Äù).
terms_employers_1_text: This document establishes the conditions under which the Company contracts the services offered by the Provider.
terms_employers_2_list: Provide truthful and complete information for proper service delivery.
Make the agreed payments within the established deadlines.
Use the services only for lawful purposes.
terms_employers_3_list: Deliver the services in due time and form as contracted.
Protect the confidentiality of information provided by the Company.
Comply with applicable data protection regulations.
terms_employers_4_text: All intellectual property rights over the software, content, or documentation provided belong to the Provider, unless expressly agreed otherwise.
terms_employers_5_text: Both parties agree not to disclose any confidential information accessed during the contractual relationship.
terms_employers_6_text: The Provider shall not be liable for indirect damages, lost profits, or losses arising from misuse of the services by the Company.
terms_employers_7_text: These terms are governed by Spanish law. For the resolution of disputes, the parties submit to the courts of Ja√©n.

refund_policy_intro: At our company, we value transparency and customer satisfaction. Therefore, we have designed a clear and fair refund policy:
refund_policy_point_1: All payments are securely processed through Stripe or other authorized payment providers.
refund_policy_point_2: You may request a full refund within 14 days of purchase, provided the service has not been used or activated.
refund_policy_point_3: Once the service has been activated or used, refunds will not be granted, except in cases of technical errors attributable to us.
refund_policy_point_4: To request a refund, please contact us at soporte@ejemplo.com providing your purchase details.
refund_policy_point_5: We reserve the right to deny refund requests that do not meet these conditions.
refund_policy_conclusion: This policy aims to ensure a fair balance between consumer protection and the company's commitment to service quality.
reembolso: The payment of the ‚Ç¨50 fee represents only the application fee and DOES NOT include all costs for obtaining the work contract and relocating to Spain. Other expenses and additional costs (visa, transportation, documents) will be communicated and negotiated later, depending on each candidate's situation. The application fee is NON-refundable..
